attributes.action: have anyone who crashes a Bugatti Veyron shot for crimes against humanity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to that plonker crashing a Bugatti Veyron I want the government to introduce harsh measures to ensure the survival of all remaining examples. I feel the death penalty would be the best way to achieve this.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
